usageDisclaimer.l: Usage of a JourneyMark enables yet does not guarantee entrance to Abydos.

issuanceDisclaimer.l: A JourneyMark indicates the issuee is granted the option of entrance to Abydos yet does not provide any other benefit.

privacyDisclaimer.l: It is the sole responsibility of Holders as Issuees of a JourneyMark to present that credential in a privacy-preserving manner using the mechanisms provided in the Issuance and Presentation Exchange (IPEX) protocol specification and the Authentic Chained Data Container (ACDC) specification. https://github.com/WebOfTrust/IETF-IPEX and https://github.com/trustoverip/tswg-acdc-specification.
